showScoreExcerpt: The thin narrative structure and minimal character development are not so much acted as felt in the expressive delivery of the songs...While not every aspect succeeds in presenting a cohesive story, its Broadway debut offers an innovative approach to the musical genre and an often electrifying experience in cutting-edge theater.

keyPhrases.quote: often electrifying experience in cutting-edge theater
The thin narrative structure and minimal character development
offers an innovative approach to the musical genre

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic acknowledges significant structural flaws but is ultimately positive about the innovative theatrical experience and musical delivery, suggesting qualified recommendation. | GPT-4o-mini: The review highlights both innovative aspects and significant narrative weaknesses, leading to a mixed recommendation.
